methods.name: getSelected
methods.docs: Get the currently selected tab. This method is only available for vanilla JavaScript projects. The Angular, React, and Vue implementations of tabs are coupled to each framework's router.

methods.name: getTab

tags.name: param
tags.text: tab The tab instance to select. If passed a string, it should be the value of the tab's `tab` property.

parameters.text: The tab instance to select. If passed a string, it should be the value of the tab's `tab` property.

methods.docs: Get a specific tab by the value of its `tab` property or an element reference. This method is only available for vanilla JavaScript projects. The Angular, React, and Vue implementations of tabs are coupled to each framework's router.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: tab The tab instance to select. If passed a string, it should be the value of the tab's `tab` property.

methods.name: select

tags.name: param
tags.text: tab The tab instance to select. If passed a string, it should be the value of the tab's `tab` property.

parameters.text: The tab instance to select. If passed a string, it should be the value of the tab's `tab` property.

methods.docs: Select a tab by the value of its `tab` property or an element reference. This method is only available for vanilla JavaScript projects. The Angular, React, and Vue implementations of tabs are coupled to each framework's router.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: tab The tab instance to select. If passed a string, it should be the value of the tab's `tab` property.

events.docs: Emitted when the navigation has finished transitioning to a new component.
Emitted when the navigation is about to transition to a new component.
